title: Why AI watermarks miss the mark in preventing misinformation
description: Watermarking has been floated by big tech as one of the most promising methods to combat misinformation in the age of artificial intelligence.

title: How Latinos consume news and in what language reflects changing demographics
description: Latinos are getting their news mostly in English and from digital sources, according to a new Pew Research Center study, which also found significant nuances on how this bicultural and often bilingual set of the American population stays informed.

title: Ex-Kentucky college student says she feels ‘violated’ after mysterious dorm attack
description: Months after Isabella "Bella" Willingham was found unresponsive and severely injured in her dorm room in a case that has baffled her family and law enforcement, the former Asbury University student is still trying to piece together what happened that day.
